lightningBolt.description: Lightning bolt uses thickness and pattern for speed indication

energyStream.description: Energy streams use width and dotted patterns for throughput

interferencePattern.description: Interference uses shapes instead of color for sync states

resonanceCelebration.description: Celebration uses animation timing instead of color transitions

modelTags.description: Model tags use distinct shapes for identification

lightningBolt.staticVersion: fixed thickness bar with numeric TPS display
lightningBolt.fallbackBehavior: immediate switch to static on user preference

energyStream.staticVersion: static width bars with directional arrows
energyStream.fallbackBehavior: particles stop, width becomes static indicator

interferencePattern.fallbackBehavior: waves stop, correlation shown as percentage

resonanceCelebration.staticVersion: simple icon flash with text notification
resonanceCelebration.fallbackBehavior: single frame celebration with audio optional

level1.cognitiveLoad: Minimal - one concept at a time

level4.legend: Explanation of adaptation logic and transparency
level4.tutorialPrompts: Understanding system learning and audit features

tooltips.lightningBolt: This lightning bolt shows how fast the AI is generating words. Thicker bolts = faster generation.
tooltips.energyStream: These flowing streams show multiple AI models working together. Wider streams = higher output.
tooltips.interferencePattern: These patterns show when AI models are synchronized (purple) or out of sync (red).
tooltips.resonanceCelebration: This celebration happens when all AI models achieve perfect synchronization.
tooltips.modelTags: These labels identify which AI model is generating each stream of text.

contextualHelp.firstTimeUser: Detailed explanations with examples and analogies
contextualHelp.returningUser: Brief reminders and new feature highlights
contextualHelp.expertUser: Advanced metrics and technical details available on demand

levelProgression.description: Full keyboard control of level selection and progression
levelProgression.focusIndicators: Clear visual focus rings on all interactive elements

pipelineBuilder.keys: Arrow keys for node movement, Enter for connections, Delete for removal
pipelineBuilder.description: Complete keyboard control of node-based pipeline construction
pipelineBuilder.shortcuts: Ctrl+Z for undo, Ctrl+Y for redo, Ctrl+S for save

legendToggle.keys: L key for legend toggle, H key for help overlay

touchAccessibility.gestureSupport: Pinch to zoom, two-finger scroll for detailed views
touchAccessibility.touchFeedback: Haptic feedback on supported devices for interactions
